page.title: 01Rossett and Area
page.content:
Rossett, Lavister, Pulford and Poulton lie directly on the border between England and Wales. They are situated on the main Chester to Wrexham road except for Poulton which is situated 'behind' Pulford. They are about six miles from Wrexham and five miles from Chester.
The main employment in the area, especially in Poulton is farming. Most people living in the area travel to other places to work. The rate of unemployment is very low compared to Wrexham.
Most of Rossett, Lavister and part of Pulford is made up of residential areas whereas Poulton and the rest of Pulford is made up of farming communities.
